title: Exodia the Forgotten Golem

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
> Use the ability of a dead golem.
> Change a golem to another non-killing golem.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> If this role spawns, exactly 4 other golems will spawn. They will have a factional chat and a basic factional kill. All golems will have the goal "Kill all who oppose the creation of more Golems."
> You can only use the abilities of a dead Golem (Killing) once per dead golem.
> This role and golems it summons can spawn in REF slots.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: > Kill all who oppose the creation of more Golems.
